name: treat
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: treat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to behave towards someone or deal with something in a particular way

example.eg: My parents treated us all the same when we were kids.
example.egtrans: 小时候父母对我们一视同仁。

example.eg: He treated his wife very badly.
It's wrong to treat animals as if they had no feelings.
example.egtrans: 把动物当成没有感情的东西来对待是错误的。

example.eg: I treat remarks like that with the contempt that they deserve.
example.egtrans: 那种说法根本不值一提，我对其嗤之以鼻。

dsense.name: treat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to use drugs, exercises, etc. to cure a person of a disease or heal an injury

example.eg: He is being treated for a rare skin disease.
example.egtrans: 他患了一种罕见的皮肤病，正在接受治疗。

example.eg: Western medicine tends to treat the symptoms and not the cause.

dsense.name: treat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to buy or pay for something for another person

example.eg: Put your money away - I'm going to treat you (to this).
example.egtrans: 把钱收起来吧——（这次）我请你。

example.eg: I'm going to treat myself to (= buy for myself) a new pair of sandals.
example.egtrans: 我要给自己买一双新凉鞋。

dsense.name: treat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to put a special substance on material such as wood, cloth, metal, etc. or put it through a special process, in order to protect it from damage or decay

example.eg: The material has been treated with resin to make it waterproof.
example.egtrans: 这种材料涂上了树脂以防水。

name: treat
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: treat
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a special and enjoyable occasion or experience

example.eg: We're going to Italy for the weekend - it's my birthday treat.
example.egtrans: 我们要去意大利度周末——为我庆祝生日。

example.eg: As a special treat, I'll take you to my favourite restaurant.
example.egtrans: 我要带你到我最喜欢的餐馆去，这是个特别待遇。

dsense.name: treat
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: an occasion when I, you, etc. buy or pay for something for another person

example.eg: No, you paid for dinner last time - this is my treat.
example.egtrans: 不，上次吃饭是你付的钱——这次我请客。
